problems.title: Determine Season Based on Date and Hemisphere
problems.description:
Given a date (day, month) and hemisphere ("Northern" or "Southern"), determine the season.

Northern Hemisphere:
- Spring: March 20 - June 20
- Summer: June 21 - September 22
- Autumn: September 23 - December 20
- Winter: December 21 - March 19

Southern Hemisphere (opposite):
- Spring: September 23 - December 20
- Summer: December 21 - March 19
- Autumn: March 20 - June 20
- Winter: June 21 - September 22

Print the season name.

Input Format:
First line: day month
Second line: hemisphere ("Northern" or "Southern")

Output Format:
Print "Spring", "Summer", "Autumn", or "Winter".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
15 3
Northern

Sample Output
Winter

Sample Input
15 3
Southern

Sample Output
Summer

Sample Input
25 6
Northern

Sample Output
Summer

Explanation:
Use nested conditions based on hemisphere, then check month and day ranges to determine season.
hintsList: Use nested if-else: first check hemisphere, then check month ranges, and handle boundary dates (20th, 21st, 22nd, 23rd) carefully for season transitions.
